overview: One man. One Mission. Is it possible? No, not really.  Milton reveals the truth about being an international spy, before being given a disappointing new identity which forced him to appear on Mock the Week, Live at the Apollo.  But this is also a love story with the twist, or even a really bad sprain.  Just gloriously daft nonsense or is there a deeper meaning? Every man has his price. Sainsburys, where good food costs less.
title: Milton Jones - Milton Impossible
